article_title: What made Al Jazeera America exec producer say ‘lunatic fringe’ runs GOP? – twitchy.com
article_text:
Paul Harris, executive producer at Al Jazeera America, thinks that the mere presence of “Duck Dynasty” star Willie Robertson at the State of the Union is proof enough that the lunatic fringe runs the Republican Party.

Nothing else need be said — but we’ll leave the comments open just in case someone thinks of something.
